mapper.sql: id, userid, babyid, technicianid, bussinessid, starttime, endtime, appointmentid, solution, timebucketid, isdelete
mapper.select: SELECT ad.id id, ad.starttime starttime, ad.endtime endtime, ad.solution solution, u.`name` uname, b.`name` bname, t.`name` tname FROM appointment_detail ad INNER JOIN `user` u ON ad.userid = u.id INNER JOIN baby b ON b.id = ad.babyid INNER JOIN technician t ON t.id = ad.technicianid INNER JOIN business bs ON bs.id = ad.bussinessid INNER JOIN appointment a ON a.id = ad.appointmentid INNER JOIN timebucket tk ON tk.id = ad.timebucketid INNER JOIN store s ON s.id = tk.storeid WHERE u.isdelete = 0 AND b.isdelete = 0 AND t.isdelete = 0 AND bs.isdelete = 0 AND a.isdelete = 0 AND ad.isdelete = 0 AND ad.appointmentid = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into appointment_detail (id, userid, babyid, technicianid, bussinessid, starttime, endtime, appointmentid, solution, timebucketid, isdelete) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{babyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{technicianid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bussinessid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{appointmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{solution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timebucketid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into appointment_detail
id,
userid,
babyid,
technicianid,
bussinessid,
starttime,
endtime,
appointmentid,
solution,
timebucketid,
isdelete,

mapper.update:
update appointment_detail
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
babyid = #{babyid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
technicianid = #{technicianid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bussinessid = #{bussinessid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
appointmentid = #{appointmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
solution = #{solution,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
timebucketid = #{timebucketid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update appointment_detail set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, babyid = #{babyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, technicianid = #{technicianid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bussinessid = #{bussinessid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, starttime = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, endtime = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, appointmentid = #{appointmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, solution = #{solution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, timebucketid = #{timebucketid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
